Song.title: Nothing Better Than Jesus
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve & Vikki Cook, and Bob Kauflin © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship/Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: There’s [F]nothing [D/F#]better than J[G]esus How [F]happy are the [C]ones{,} who be[G]long to You There’s [F]nothing [D/F#]better than J[G]esus The [F]one who is the [C]life,{,} and the [G]only truth And [F]when You come, You [C]fill our lives with fr[Dsus]uit [D] There’s nothing better than Y[F]ou [D/F# | G | F C | G]
Verse 1: [C] What a beautiful w[G]orld{,} You’ve made for [D]us [| D] [C] Filled with wonderful g[G]ifts{,} that show Your l[D]ove [| D] The m[Am]ountains and the va[Bm]lleys, the pl[C]anets and the s[D]tars [Am] But none of these can comp[C]are{,} with who You [D]are [| D]
Verse 2: [C] What a beautiful th[G]ing{,} You’ve done for [D]us [| D] [C] Came to die for our s[G]ins upon the c[D]ross [| D] You l[Am]ove the weak and h[Bm]umble, who r[C]un to You for h[D]elp [Am] You have the power to s[C]ave{,} like no one [D]else [| D]
Spoken: [G]Planets and oceans, [F]towering [C]trees [G]Jesus is greater than [F]all of [C]these [G]Armies and airplanes, [F]princes and [C]kings [G]Jesus is stronger than [F]every[C]thing [G]Presents and birthdays, [F]Jesus is [C]better [G]Forever and always, [F]Jesus is [C]better [G]Better than anything [F]you can im[C]agine [G]Jesus is better than [F]all! [C]
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus theres nothing better than jesus how happy are the ones who belong to you theres nothing better than jesus the one who is the life and the only truth and when you come you fill our lives with fruit theres nothing better than you verse 1 what a beautiful world youve made for us filled with wonderful gifts that show your love the mountains and the valleys the planets and the stars but none of these can compare with who you are verse 2 what a beautiful thing youve done for us came to die for our sins upon the cross you love the weak and humble who run to you for help you have the power to save like no one else spoken planets and oceans towering trees jesus is greater than all of these armies and airplanes princes and kings jesus is stronger than everything presents and birthdays jesus is better forever and always jesus is better better than anything you can imagine jesus is better than all
